title: What causes failed to create dump file 183
body:
been getting this a bit recently when I launch customs to test my internet and game stability and this keeps appearing when my game crashes.

really could use some help with this. :\

replies.body:
This issue has popped up in the past and has almost always been caused by a problematic display driver. I'd recommend trying a [**driver rollback**](http://www.nvidia.com/object/driver_rollback.html) in case this is the cause of the issue.

If you don't know how to roll back your specific driver, let me know which video card your computer uses, or simply your computer's model number and I'll do my best to assist you.
